content.detailedDescription: I wasn't sure what i was looking at,so i went to get my phone .It was still there doing all these different manuevers.Blinking and changing colors.Red,blue ,green,and white.Spinning around and pulsating.At one point some kind of static came thru my phone.I think it was trying to confuse me,or get my phone to mess up.So i stopped and restarted to film again and got the second video.Same thing happen ,the red metering looking rays hitting my transmission.Then just as fast as it caught my eye.It was gone..
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Was going to the gym at 5:30 in the morning and was attracted to something sparkling,so i looked up and seen this what look like to be a star but it started pulsating and moving around 18 different colors coming out of it all of a sudden it shot up straig

content.detailedDescription:
I was playing basketball with my friends in the park when i saw a light in the horizon moving like crazy and then it dissapeared.
i tried to tell everyone but no one trusted me.

help please
content.summary: Was a golf ball shaped light zig zaging in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Gentlemen!
maybe this is a different report you are get used to received. i wil try to be clear as possible as i can.
i contacted, by accident, a member of a us security organization, something like that, and we were connected, somehow to this event just reported in this file.
observe, that was night, i was not dreaming, and we were mentally in touch.  
i supposed not to be envolved with this experience, as i said, we were together by accident.
anyway, we observed the ufos close to moon and later, this federal agent, showed me a office and a laboratory with a big generator with courtains of radiant colours. 
it seemed to me like a tournado, round and round. 
what i could realize there is official experiences envolving humans and spatials (as i call the extra terrestrials).
messages of these experiences was about world preservation, human kind, nature and specially thoughts and feellings.
the us official member asked to project thoughts of kindness, peace, harmony, etc, feeding, energizing, the mental field of earth.
why? us government, in this especif case, could use this power, mental resources, to provide human race life. 
there are more details, but it is not my intention to sound like a cliche, telling "we need to be good and pray for peace, stop the war, ..."
the fact is that a huge egregore envolves planet earth and nations (officials members) and spatials are dealing with mental issues throwing
types of flashes.
the federal agent was true in his felling and concern about this project and i was happy to know usa government gets concern about this issue. 
my wish: take this seriously because is true and it was the beginning of others experiences.
my best regards!!
alexandre godoi
content.summary: It was night and the tree ufos were close to the moon and i could see the round shape. they gone fast at the same time.

content.detailedDescription: Two lights side by side coming out of the west .Thought it was and airplane at first cause i live about six miles from airport .When the left light dipped down and the right light went up i thought an airplane was about to crash .That was until the one the was on left swung back up to where the right light was then it was gone ps the aircraft goes from north to south not west to east .
content.summary: Two lights side by side .From me the left side dropped as the right side rose .Then then then the what was fliped around and was now the left side was now on the right did a complete 360 and then disipeared

content.detailedDescription: I was going  to pick up my kid from work when i saw a big bright light i thought it was a plane hope it was but it was down and the it went up like ascending when i started looking and taking pictures i took  two pictures when i i looked to see the pictures and looked up it was gone i fell liked no it can be what i am thinking than i look at the first picture and there was one light and when i look at the second one i sought the light and than another light that freak me up i felt really strange i hope it was just a plane and a cloud
content.summary: I saw a big light took pictures look up and is was gone

content.detailedDescription: Just wondering if anyone else saw a stationary light in the south sky at 6 am over dayton ohio. first observed light when drink coffee outside. at first it looked like a star but it was flashing. i got out a set of binoculars (16x50) and then you could see 3 distinct lights white, blue, green. after watching for 10 minutes with binoculars i got out my telescope. with the telescope the object was a bright diamond white light in the center with green horizontal lights and blue/yellow vertical lights. my wife and daughter both watched the object with me. you could view it till dawn washed out the sky
content.summary: Object was cross shaped center bright light with blue and green light

content.detailedDescription: Working with my son on his conch fishing boat in cape may, nj. on the morning of the 4th of september 2015. around 6.Am, we were boating through the cape may ferry channel heading towards the delaware bay to our fishing grounds. we were passing the ferry docks at the no-wake zone when i observed a low level bright light that seemed to be following the boat. jokingly i said to my son that a ufo was following us. we pasted the no-wake zone and speeded up to around 18 knots. the object mimicked our speed. we boated past the ferry jetties and turned 30 degrees to the right into the open bay. the object made the same direction change. at this point we both started to look at each other and be a little concerned. we traveled for approximately 1 quarter mile and my son started to freak out and stopped the boat. the object did the same. no noise was ever heard, and the object seemed to be coming closer. i took five cell phone photos and i laughed it off and said "if we are going to be abducted there is nothing we can do about it". as the sun rise became lighter the object became smaller, also moved higher in altitude and finally disappeared.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright star-like glowing ball that followed our boat out of water way channel to bay, object followed boats movements.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at john lloyd beach with my family. 
had my dslr with me and was photographing the scene.
set my dslr on burst mode. 
took 7 shot sequence of birds flying overhead.
unknown object appeared in two of the frames(file: dsc_0013 and dsc_0014). 
the end.

not my first ufo sighting. had my first one in lima/peru as a teenager with a group of my high school friends, and was witnessed by other residents and  reported on local news channels.
content.summary: Photographed unknown object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My friend mistook a atlas v rocket launch for a ufo hovering above miami airport.I am not a witness to the event - i just told mufon about the sighting
content.summary: Lights of miami

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my back deck to look at the moon because it was just about full ,and it was a beautiful bright clear night.Perfect visability.I walked out to see the moon which was directly in front of me.Then to my left at about 45 degree angle abright obect got my attention.It appeared to be about 200 ft of the ground,15 to 20 ft long,completly silent,and amazingly still,completly motionless.It appeared to have red lights on both ends and it seemed like 3 white lights in the middle of the red.The lights were very bright and constant,no blinking or strobing at all.They were so bright all you could see was the lights you couldn't make out  any form other than the lights.At that point i was like,what is that!Then it moved to the rt rapidly and abruptly stop.I wouldn't even desribe it as hovering again it was amazingly motionless.Then slowly it moved back to the left and went behind some trees,but you could still see it a bit thru the leaves.At that point i went to my frieds house upstairs for abetter look.We went on his deck with me, him and his 10 year old daughter.You couldn't see it at first.I think he thought i was a little carried away then slowly it came back to the rt into sight .It slowly went to the rt about the same distance it did when i first saw it.Then it appeared to do a 360,and when it rotated you could see three much smaller white lights which appeared to me that it seemed as if they were windows,but kept rotating until the bigger brighter lights returned.Then went back behind the trees.At this point i went down stairs to tell the guy below us to check it out.So now you have me,the guy downstairs,his wife,and there 6yr old son on one deck,and the guy upstairs,his daughter,and now his wife on theyre deck.It went back an forth about 5 times.At one point it rose straight up 15 to 20 feet.It was weird like it was on an elevator,so straight.Finally it went off behind the trees and did not reappear.The whole thing lasted about 40 minutes.The whole time this was happening we were all amazed everybody just kept saying,what is that!?How come you cant here it.Wow look how bright it is.This was not an airplane.If it was a helicopter it was so close it would have been making some noise!And it was way to big to be a drone and it was so under control .I)v seen plenty of drones before and none possessed this kind of control for so long.It seemed as if it was looking for something.We all agreed it was the strangest thing we have ever ever seen in the air.And the area it seemed it was over was the dracut state forrest in mass.So i thought mabey someone got lost in the woods.Nope. and no one airlifted from the area that night.I am 54 yrs old and have never seen anything even remotely close to what we all saw that night.That was also everybodys opinion.What was it?Who knows.But man that was so cool i would love to see it again.One of the girls tried to get it on theyre phone but it didn't work.
content.summary: Jawdropping

content.detailedDescription:
Ibamos de camino a nuestras casas con una amiga en su vehã­culo, pasabamos precisamente por el anillo perifã©rico frente a la residencial zarahemla camino al desvã­o de valle de ã�ngeles, cuando un reflejo como el de luz en un espejo llamo mi atenciã³n, inmediatamente como pude le dije ve despacio, y allã­ estaba, un disco plateado volando lentamente por el cielo.

de esas casualidades, en la residencial zarahemla estaban contruyendo la casa de mi amiga, y precisamente el ovni volaba por el lado en que su casa estaba ubicada. rã¡pidamente luego de haber hecho el retorno en el anillo perifã©rico llegamos hasta su propiedad. ambos nos detuvimos a ver aquel objeto volador plateado que volaba sobre si mismo girando en contra de la manecillas del reloj, cruzaba en lã­nea recta muy lentamente y un poco inclinado, de tal manera que logramos ver su parte superior, en la que podã­a observarse una pequeã±a cãºpula en su parte superior.

durante aproximadamente 10 minutos o mã¡s vimos aquel objeto volar lentamente por el cielo frente a nosotros. creo que nuestra distancia del objeto era aproximadamente de unos 50-100 metros, algunos 30 a 50 grados de inclinaciã³n, quizã¡ algunos 10 metros o un poco mã¡s era su tamaã±o.

esa tarde habã­a brisa sobre la ciudad de tegucigalpa y estaba nublado. nos quedamos viã©ndolo hasta que se perdiã³ en las nubes obscuras que cubrã­an parcialmente el cielo. por cierto, era un cielo hermoso color rojizo parcialmente nublado que contribuã­a a resaltar la belleza del objeto que se dejaba ver completamente para nosotros. no hubo ningãºn movimiento brusco o irregular, todo fue muy pacã­fico mientras veã­amos su hermosa rã¡pida rotaciã³n inclinado volando en lã­nea recta.

ademã¡s, mi amiga filmo desde su smartphone de ãºltima generaciã³n casi todo. hasta que se extravã­o en la nubes. lastimosamente, ella no me ha facilitado el vã­deo poniendo varias excusas... no sabe como enviarlo desde su iphone, que no lo encuentra por que cambio de telã©fono, y que finalmente lo borrã³ por miedo. y a la fecha no sã© que pasã³ con la evidencia.
content.summary: Platillo, plateado, hermoso, enorme

content.detailedDescription: It was thursday around five thirty,we were at the levi stadium parkin lot waiting for the fourth miners to play the chargers,so we were just bbqing hanging out,idky i looked up at the sky but noticed a bright dot moving along the sky. so i said some hinges jokingly, look it's a ufo! so i caught my brothers attention ,and even started looking up at  the sky and as well as others,then my brother says, look there's more ! and that's when i noticed the other ones ,there was 3in formation in a triangle formation,and two others trailing behind and at times getting brighter and also dissapearing,as others claimed it was birds i knew it wasn't because they were too high up and i witnessed hawks and eagles at a high distance and even then you could tell it was bird,and even a plane was in the distance and the objects were way higher than the plane,as they glided north hey evetually disappeared.
content.summary: One craft like object seen first,then 4 more appeared

content.detailedDescription: My encounter happened when i lived in coral springs fla and lived on the edge of the street light dome and the everglades darkness begins so i am calling that the termination line. so i was out back and observing jupiter to the west, i looked away from my scope and there it was a long triangle shape all black and yellow fuzzy lights on each corner moving very slow eastbound heading for the termination line. i was frozen and could not move but i was not scared and i could not even close my eyes. as the ufo entered the termination line it became invisible a little at a time like i said it was moving slowly so as the ufo moved deeper into the light more and more of it disappeared into the light , like it was cloaking itself this took about 5 to 7 min. once the ufo was gone from sight i could move again so i ran inside and told my room mate what happened so he came out but it was now cloaked into the city lights and he said i was crazy but i know what i seen and that i was paralyzed by it, i still see it in my mind clear as day. i am including a pic but it is for reference only this is not the ufo i encountered
content.summary: Long thin triangle about 10 feet thick, yellow fuzzy lights on each corner, no sound

content.detailedDescription: During a summer night, sitting with my wife in our backyard, looking at the stars, we saw a small luminous sphere approaching to us. the colour was a very beatiful pure emerald green. size about 1 feet diameter, but difficult to estimate exact size. it flew slowly (about 6 miles/hour) in an horizontal path, with a zig zag movement with no sound, seemed to move just above the trees, about 45 feet tall. it seemed to be searching for something. it took us less than two seconds to realize that was something very weird, i had a knot in my throat and hardly could say: "what the h... is that!". after a few seconds i rushed inside the house to get my camera but when looked at the sky again it has vanished. since that day my wife never wanted to talk about that anymore. more than 20 years later, it gives me goosebumps just recalling the sighting. after that i kept on reading about that kind of sightings, now i know what i saw was a "foo fighter".
content.summary: Sphere glowing intense emerald green as it had a light inside, flying silent in z pattern, horizontal above trees

content.detailedDescription: I live 30-40 miles from wpafb and have seen similar objects before.  they appear as bright stars but after watching - it becomes clear that they are actually something else.  when they do move - the movements are very quick and irregular.  they also will suddenly disappear once they are finished "hovering or feeding off storm energy".  i wanted to get a closer look so i attached my zoom lens to my camera and ended up with some interesting pictures.  i'm including two pictures - one from 9/2/15 and another from a few weeks prior.  i believe they are either the same craft or same type of craft.
content.summary: Ufo hovering near storm clouds

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i where in the backyard, and out of thin air, a light came on, then another and another until 4 lights were visible. once the 4th light came on, they all rotated counter clockwise. the 4th one moved into position to form a 3 light line, and the 1st was at a point to form a triangle. once the 4th moved into position, they all took their turn turning off the light.
content.summary: 4 lights in the sky over imperial beach

content.detailedDescription: We we're looking at the night sky on my birthday when we noticed small lights moving across the sky not knowing what they were assuming they could've been satellites but went different direction but when we got up to leave we turned around to notice a huge shot of bluish green light shot straight into the sky. looked like it cut a slit in the night sky.
content.summary: We seen small far away lights in the  sky and when we got up to leave we saw a huge green  light that looked like it cut a hole in the sky
Bright glowing object, speeding across the night sky, stopped suddenly, ascends into portal & disappears

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out with witness on the phone by field investigator l. flechter, at mufon hq on friday 9/4/2015
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
while living in the flamingo trailer park behind the karcher mall i saw a craft in the sky.
it was the summer of 1977 about midnight i thought i saw lights out side and i looked out the window and saw a football field sized craft hovering near the parking lot of the mall. it was parking lot light high.It seemed to have red, blue, and green light, but i realized it was energy, not lights. i called to my wife to see and she was speechless. it was there 10 minutes before i went to get the camera, but it had no film. i ran outside toward the craft, ignoring my wife yelling at me to come back. i was 20 years old and thought i was tough. i approached the craft and waved my arms at it. it lowered a ramp for me. the ramp was 4" thick and glistened like sand, it did have a sand like appearance. half the way up two small child like beings came toward me and stopped on either side of me. they were 2 1/2' tall, white skinned with empty eyes. they moved like robots, something was not right about them. they wore royal blue suits with a silver strip on them that did sparkle. i reached over to pick one up and a voice told me not to, that they would hurt me. i walked up the ramp and stopped at the entrance to the ship. a voice asked me if i was coming in or not. so i went in. the creature was built like a linebacker and covered in short brown hair. it had perfect teeth and humanoid eyes and face. it had arms and a torso, but no legs or feet. where the feet should have been was maybe a large foot with suckers on the bottom. when it moved it made sucking and squeaking noises. the creature talked to me in perfect english and very mannerly. it also used telepathy. i was scanned in four different upright machines, i didn't have to lay down and as far as i know they took no blood. i asked where he came from and he said he couldn't say. he showed me around the ship and the next thing i remember i was standing outside on the parking lot. the craft moved/jumped several blocks, making no noise at all. then it moved/jumped straight up, hovered, and moved/jumped away very fast.  
i hadn't remembered much of the story until i saw a national geographic special about hairy animals in the water. then it all came back to me.
since this happened to me i have had a very bad memory, neraphy, diabetes and black outs. i have been to a doctor and want to be hypnotized to see if i can remember more. i'm only 58 years old.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: In the summer of 1977 about midnight i thought i saw lights out side and i looked out the window and saw a football field sized craft

content.detailedDescription:
I have two boxes of recorded tape,  of this spheres moving toward the infrared light i have next to the infrared camera, used for protection of my front yard, the spheres came in groups looking for the infrared beam, ad want time, one even touched the light. i have multiple visits, mostly on the times of 23:00 till 3-4 am.
i will appreciate if any official of mufon is interested in the recordings i will give them for free, or in contrary i will destroy them!
thank you.
content.summary: Transparent spheres flying toward my infrared proyector at front of my house

content.detailedDescription:
Good evening respectable mufon,

i'm ready to tell my ufo encounter now, back at 2011 i was still in the us army and i was just scary that telling this will make me some kind of joke.

i was a ssg in light infantry unit, at that time we were doing a brigade size training exercise in playas area, nm in desert type environment with medium to high mountain peek.

i was the nco in charge of a recon squad and test out to set up an observation point to spot and gave warning defense comm to our main patrol base on  enemy movement. it was in the afternoon that we arrived at the highest point and i assigned to my guys their respective sector of guard/fire and i was in the middle of this op base. 

i don't remember the time but we still have daylight so as april my estimate time is between 04 - 0430 pm. our altitude was around 3000 ft and i just looked straight above me and i saw this moving triangle shape object and i thought was a commercial airplane. suddenly it stopped and right away in my mind i thought that's wasn't possible and where was the exhaust tail from the jet engine!!

it was just few seconds and it was really high but i can see with my naked eyes ( my estimate total altitude of the object was around 25000 feet). it can be less as i can see this weird bright orange color and white in the middle of it and i was amazed again from the fact that was there not moving at all! few seconds of hovering and that object speed up and just disappear, plain simple.

i looked around to see if somebody was looking like me but they were just fixing their firing positions. i just told myself that never happened and move on. 

few months ago i got out from the service but it is still stamped in my mind.

thanks to give us a voice.

v/r

joseph merlino
content.summary: It was triangle shape object hovering  color white and bright orange

content.detailedDescription: I was going to the shell gas station on the corner ib,  i saw a pattern of  lights separated by less then 1 mile each or less in a 50 angle aproxx, the lights were intense, close to an airplane headlight, they hovered somewhat, they appeared to be in the same plane, then they started to turn off one by one. there was nothing else to be tracked then.
content.summary: Several bright lighs filled the sky, in a perpendicular plane, then slowly disspeared one by one

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv when my mother asked my to come to the front door. when i did, she pointed up towards the south western sky, where i witnessed three gun metal grey ovals hovering in the sky. about 5-10 minutes after i first started watching them, i decided i'd seen enough and went back inside.
my mother continued to watch for a further 5 minutes where she witnessed not three, but now six of these craft blinking in and out of existence, appearing in different places in the sky.
content.summary: Three gun metal grey colored ovals which appeared to blink in and out of existence.

content.detailedDescription: I was working stop took 3 pictures of the sun look at my photos lter and found this
content.summary: Was at work snap 3 pic of the sun looked at me picturs later

content.detailedDescription:
i was between 7 and 9 in the late 1950's when the instances took place. we lived on the corner of two sparsely populated streets, cogswell and westvale, several miles out of town. the houses were far apart. there was a field across the street and trees behind us. i think the house is now in the middle of a subdivision  all of the abductions occurred at night when everyone in the house should be asleep.  two entities would come to my bedroom window.  i would suddenly find myself outside with them. i don't remember getting out of bed. the entities were not much taller than me, had large heads and black, oval eyes that were too big for their heads. i don't recall seeing the whites of their eyes. there were only slits or lines where the mouth and nose should be.  they were otherwise very skinny. their skin was greyish-brownish color. i thought they were sick, funny looking kids at the time. their clothes were skin tight. i was never afraid. they kept reassuring me telepathically. i heard them, but their mouths never opened. i also empathically felt that they did not want to hurt me. they seemed friendly. they made me feel very safe.

  i only remember the following happening the first time. they walked me to the craft which was in my backyard in a large sandy area that dad often complained about because nothing could be planted there, then up a ramp to the inside.  a third entity was in charge of flying the craft. i stood by the window as the craft took off. we flew into space to a larger craft.  in retrospect, the craft must have flown very fast, because we flew past other planets.  i remember seeing saturn with all the big rocks flying around it.  i also saw jupiter, which they explained about the hot, poison gases and how they did not want to get too near the planet with the ship.  i told my parents, teacher and other students at school about the planets. all assumed that i had read about these things in books. but i didn't have such books at home and we were not studying the galaxy in second or third grade.

  the small craft flew into a larger craft where i was led into a cold, metal room with other adult humans all sitting on a metal bench that was build into the wall and lined the entire room except where the doors were. everyone stared straight ahead, as if they were drugged. they did not acknowledge or speak to me or anyone else. another entity lead the gentleman next to me out another door, much like a nurses aid in a doctor's waiting room. that was the last thing i remember until i woke up the next day in my own bed. 

after the first encounter, i would see the little people at my window and the craft in the backyard, but do not remember anything else. only waking up the next morning in my bed. my mother always referred to them as my little green men, assuming that i made them up although it was very real to me.  it's one of the clearest memories i have as a child.

  when i was 30, i had a tubal ligation done to tie my fallopian tubes.  the doctor was able to do one side, but something kept him from reaching the other side.  he decided to do exploratory surgery. he found masses of scar tissue. he was perplexed because there was nothing in my medical history to explain this.  i wonder if i was one of those abductees on which exploratory surgery was performed.
content.summary: Small, circular craft.  large enough for 4 entities and myself (from ages 7-9)

content.detailedDescription:
On wednesday 7/15/08 early morning at around 2:45 am,  after having a smoke because i could not sleep, i saw a huge triangular object gliding  very low over my house in milford, connecticut in the harbor of the housatonic river. the object was the size of a large department store and had a green hue, and was flaming in the back, the flames were wild like a bon fire, and as long as a football field, but cast no light. the flames were so large that the sky should have been lit like it was day. this ship made no noise and glided so smooth, the object was so large that it should have fallen from the sky at the speed it was going.  i did report this on the internet the night it happened and have had many responses from people who saw the same object that night at the same time in the same direction.
the reason i am reporting now to mufon is because i did not even no who mufon was at the time of the sighting. 
also the reason i am contacting you is because of an episode of "hangar 1" i recently watched,
it was the "far side of the moon" episode.. 
there was a 3d model of the ship you guys had in the show. i had never seen that ship anywhere except the night i saw it in person. as soon as i saw your model i started getting hit with anxiety. that is exactly what i saw, but it was on fire.
i have lots of current info that i am afraid to share on this site but am willing to share in person.
i also have pictures of some other unexplained objects taken when the sky was full of chemtrails.
i have attached a picture that i made to show what i saw in 2008
i have no phone and can only be reached by the email i have provided.
i have been in contact with jan c. harzan, and he is the person who suggested i report this sighting so late in the game.
please understand that this has affected my life and also i feel i might have lost time the night i encountered this ship.
content.summary: Huge triangle on fire
